name: Rolling on the Floor Laughing
baseMeaning: A yellow face tilted to the side with closed eyes and a broad grin, tears streaming down.
tldr: ROFL - laughing so hard you're rolling on the floor.

contextMeanings.example: I can't stop watching this 不

contextMeanings.meaning: Intense laughter, often at someone's expense.
contextMeanings.example: He really thought that was a good idea 不

contextMeanings.meaning: Showing you're having a great time laughing together.
contextMeanings.example: Our conversations always have me like 不

contextMeanings.meaning: Can be used to mock or laugh at absurd situations.
contextMeanings.example: Gas prices went up again 不

platformNotes.note: Very popular for reacting to memes and viral content.
Common reaction emoji, though Gen Z sometimes avoids it.

generationalNotes.note: Often considered 'cringe' or overused by older generations.
Absolute favorite for anything remotely funny.

seoTitle: 不 ROFL Emoji Meaning - What Does 不 Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the rolling on the floor laughing emoji 不 really means. Why some love it and others cringe at ROFL - explained.
